1.title: Wild & Crazy Wahoo

episode of.title: Grill It! with Bobby Flay (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: Tailgating has taught Jenn Karlman a thing or two about grilling. Prepared: grilled wahoo with puttanesca sauce; wahoo sandwiches; warm spinach salad with grilled rum pears; and crostinis with caramelized plums, ricotta and black pepper.

2.title: Flay-va Filet

episode of.title: Grill It! with Bobby Flay (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: Bobby grills filet mignon and tops it with blue-cheese butter, while a viewer coats hers in chocolate-coffee barbecue sauce. Also prepared: stuffed portobella mushrooms; truffle-oil grilled mushrooms; summertime cocktails.

3.title: We Be Lamb-In

episode of.title: Grill It! with Bobby Flay (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: Bobby Flay and Brooklynite Henry Tenney grill lamb two ways. Bobby prepares curry-crusted leg of lamb with a pomegranate raita and saffron-basmati-rice salad, while Henry grills Middle Eastern-style leg of lamb and grilled stuffed zucchini.

4.title: Burgerlicious

episode of.title: Grill It! with Bobby Flay (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: Bobby & Tassa Hampton whip up a cornucopia of delicious turkey burgers. Bobby makes burgers w/goat cheese, lemon-honey mustard & grilled steak fries in citrus aioli; Tassa makes turkey burgers w/paprika aioli, with insalata-Caprese kabobs.

5.title: Salmon Anyone?

episode of.title: Grill It! with Bobby Flay (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: Bobby's guest, John Aspra, puts a Mexican flair on cedar-plank-salmon tacos. Bobby makes Asian-inspired grilled salmon in a hoison sauce and buckwheat-noodle salad.

6.title: Not Your Average Chicken

episode of.title: Grill It! with Bobby Flay (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: Bobby and his guest Art Chudabala take grilled chicken to a new level. Dishes include Korean-style grilled chicken and bibimbap salad; Thai barbecue chicken and grilled veggies.

7.title: All About Bass

episode of.title: Grill It! with Bobby Flay (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: NFNS runner-up Jeffrey Saad meets Bobby again, to grill with the master. Jeffrey grills striped bass with an achiote rub and corn with cilantro pesto; Bobby prepares Moroccan-style striped bass fillets with orange-almond couscous.

8.title: Finger Lickin' Chicken

episode of.title: Grill It! with Bobby Flay (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: The sky is the limit as Bobby & Marc Matsumoto fire up the grill. They prepare grilled chicken cordon bleu; teriyaki-chicken lettuce wraps; grilled rice balls; grilled poached Asian pears; and grilled nectarines topped with ricotta cheese.

9.title: Leg-Oh My Lamb-O

episode of.title: Grill It! with Bobby Flay (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: Bobby joins artist and foodie Chaz Smith in a lamb-grilling extravaganza.

10.title: Grilled Sandwich Showdown

episode of.title: Grill It! with Bobby Flay (TV Series 2008– )

10.plot: A grilled sandwich throwdown. Included: Pittsburgh-style cheesesteak paninis; Greek-inspired grilled patty melts w/kasseri cheese & muhammara; grilled eggplant-and-mozzarella on ciabetta w/warmed potato chips & homemade Gorgonzola sauce.

11.title: Have Fork, Grill Pork

episode of.title: Grill It! with Bobby Flay (TV Series 2008– )

11.plot: Claire Robinson ("5 Ingredient Fix") joins Bobby to grill pork tenderloin two ways. Included: stuffed pork tenderloin with grilled kale and peach-whiskey beurre blanc; lemon-and-oregano-marinated pork tenderloin.

12.title: Dog Days of Grilling

episode of.title: Grill It! with Bobby Flay (TV Series 2008– )

12.plot: Nick Suarez knows how to grill one tasty hot dog.

13.title: East Meets Southwest Ribs

episode of.title: Grill It! with Bobby Flay (TV Series 2008– )

13.plot: Think BBQ sauce is the only way to make ribs? Think again. Bobby makes Southwest spice-rubbed ribs with a chipotle-honey glaze and blue-cheese slaw and a viewer prepares sweet-and-spicy Thai BBQ ribs and a grilled-corn-and-tomato salad.

14.title: Jumbo Shrimp, Jumbo Flavor

episode of.title: Grill It! with Bobby Flay (TV Series 2008– )

14.plot: Bobby & Ralph "Sonny" Aloisio tackle grilled jumbo shrimp. Prepared: citrus-marinated grilled jumbo shrimp; grilled-shrimp scampi; cheesy polenta w/wild mushrooms; grilled zucchini salad; crostini w/grilled scallions, tomato & mascarpone.

15.title: Grilled Pizza-Palooza

episode of.title: Grill It! with Bobby Flay (TV Series 2008– )

15.plot: Volunteer firefighter Jen Cook heats things up with her Grilled Pizza. Included: Asian chicken pizza; four-cheese pizza with figs and prosciutto; pesto pizza with red peppers and basil; grilled-peach-and-cajeta pizza topped with almonds.

16.title: Holy Sausage!

episode of.title: Grill It! with Bobby Flay (TV Series 2008– )

16.plot: Grilled sausage takes the stage as Lionel Freitas builds a Fire Pit Paella.

17.title: Party Like a Lobster

episode of.title: Grill It! with Bobby Flay (TV Series 2008– )

17.plot: What is Bobby Flay's favorite way to cook lobster? Grill it, of course. Lobster tacos and grilled lobster tail with mango chutney are made, along with grilled bananas foster and pineapple cocktails.

18.title: Burger Bash

episode of.title: Grill It! with Bobby Flay (TV Series 2008– )

18.plot: When it comes to the grill, there is nothing Bobby loves more than burgers!

19.title: Chocolate

episode of.title: Grill It! with Bobby Flay (TV Series 2008– )

imdb.title: Grill It! with Bobby Flay
akas: Grill It! with Bobby Flay (United States)
plot: One lucky fan lives out their ultimate culinary fantasy with Chef Bobby Flay as he recreates the fan's favorite dish. The secret, Chef Flay has no idea what he is about to prepare.
